lines.text: Take care of her, she's a classic.
Yeah. A classic piece of junk.
Ciao? C-H-O-W. The guy's a writer and he can't even spell.
What's so great about your jeans?
Patrick, did you know that most presidents cheat on their wives?
Well, I know they've been screwing over the American public for quite a while.
Why don't you just bring the phone to bed so that we can screw and make script changes at the same time?
